data.eml:eml: Parasitic copepods infesting the olfactory sacs of skates from the southwestern Atlantic with the description of a new species of Kroeyerina Wilson, 1932

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Irigoitia, Manuel M., Cantatore, Delfina M. P., Incorvaia, Inés S., Timi, Juan T. (2016): Parasitic copepods infesting the olfactory sacs of skates from the southwestern Atlantic with the description of a new species of Kroeyerina Wilson, 1932. Zootaxa 4174 (1): 137-152, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4174.1.10
